Reviews.Content: youre travelling budget dont mind noise 247 otherwise forget hotel located lower la rambla especially weekends noise outside 247 late night revellers 7am replaced tourists pension picasso located flights stairs entry via buzzer external door internal door external door usually day entry difficult reception night supposedly 24 hours day receptionist shaky grasp english spanish single shared bathroom overlooking la rambla clean sink tv hard bed ache wc near reception bathroom shower corridor door didnt close lock properly didnt returning hotel midnight constantly harrassed prostitutes outside hotel noise outside constant sleep drunk pass shared balcony door privacy issue people sitting outside window check reception left key departed pros cheap clean location cons location else picasso cheap thats youre student budget night fine else recommended cheap nasty
